page.title: 09Shopping In A Country Area
page.content: Most people do their food shopping in Northwich, Weaverham or Frodsham, although surrounding Cheshire towns are also used. The village shops are used more by older people and those who do npt have a car. Elderly people use the Post Office for their pension, and then they buy groceries and bread in the shop. People go to buy food in Northwich because it is a larger town and their is more choice. You can go to the supermarket and buy a whole trolley full of shopping and it is usually cheaper than the village shop. At the supermarket you can buy meat, fish, wine, hardware, fruit and vegetables and groceries. My Mum goes shopping to Northwich, Weaverham and Warrington and she uses the village shop for odd items.
